Dashboard.card_start_desc: Select multiple recipes, we'll orchestrate the perfect timeline.
Dashboard.card_start_desc_biz: Select active SOPs for kitchen synchronization processing.
Dashboard.card_menu_desc: Generate beautiful menu images for your dinner party.
Dashboard.card_menu_desc_biz: Generate printable menu assets for distribution.
Dashboard.recommend_hint: Create more recipe types (Staple, Soup, Cold Dish) to unlock smart combos.

Landing.hero_desc_personal: Cook like following GPS. Real-time voice timing and multi-dish coordination make every meal a chef's masterpiece.
Landing.hero_desc_business: Digitize back-of-house workflows. Improve efficiency, ensure consistency, and reduce labor costs with standardized SOPs and smart scheduling.
Landing.features_subtitle_personal: We are not just a recipe app, but your smart kitchen brain.
Landing.features_subtitle_business: Elevate operational efficiency from standardized SOPs to real-time scheduling.
Landing.feature_1_desc: Say goodbye to vague "some" or "dash". We break down every dish into a data stream with precise time, temperature, and equipment.
Landing.feature_1_desc_business: Transform paper recipes into cloud-executable data. Supports version control, permissions, and instant distribution.
Landing.feature_2_desc: No more chaos with three dishes and soup. The system calculates the optimal path for perfect synchronization.
Landing.feature_2_desc_business: Algorithms automatically calculate station loads, optimize serving order, reduce wait times, and increase turnover.
Landing.feature_3_desc: Subscribe directly to exclusive recipes from Michelin chefs and recreate top restaurant flavors at home.
Landing.feature_3_desc_business: New staff learn by doing on iPads, reducing training costs and ensuring consistent taste across branches.
